name: Phase Out
description:
Welcome to PHASE OUT. A casual 2D RPG  battle game used as a promotional tool based on duo Cara Neir's album entitled Phase Out -- a pixelated metal & punk-infused chiptuneish isekai concept album about the band being warped into a video game dimension by a sinister alien named The One From Trimjrtle with the use of a forbidden handheld device called RPGBOY.  

We just can't remember how to die. The One has tricked us in any dimension we're subjected to...

Now you can relive a small portion of the album's story through these c u r s e d battles against strange beings and monsters.  

This game is meant to be an aesthetic alternative way of enjoying our themes or if you're the type to just sit back and enjoy the soundtrack, which we created specifically for this game. 

Controls: WASD (up/down/left/right) and ENTER (confirm selection)

Game Developer: Nyanko Games

Soundtrack/Sound Design: Garry Brents and Chris Francis

Title Screen Logo: Garry Brents

Ending Animation:  MikAnimus
